text: Good Charlotte is the debut studio album by American pop punk band Good Charlotte. Good Charlotte was released on September 26, 2000. It was the first and last album to feature Aaron Escolopio on the drums. All of the songs except for "Let Me Go" and "Seasons" were written by Benji and Joel Madden. "Let Me Go" and "Seasons" were written by Benji Madden, Joel Madden and Josh Ian. ==Songs== ===2000 original release=== ===Japanese release=== ===2003 rerelease=== ==References== Category:2000 albums Category:Good Charlotte albums Category:Pop punk albums Category:Epic Records albums
title: Good Charlotte (album)
